extendedInfo.description: Are you a Seinfeld fan?  Have you seen more episodes than youâve missed?  Could you work as an intern for Kramerica?  This is a must have app if you enjoy the greatest sitcom of all time!  Test your knowledge by answering questions from the very first episode through the series finale.  Fantastic background pictures and hilarious sound clips will take you back to some of the funniest shows ever.  Challenge your friends, see how high your score can go.Stop by Monkâs and grab some coffee because youâre about to get jiggy with it.  Check it out and see what other options the gang has to offer.  If for some reason, you don't believe this App is worthy of 4+ stars, please email us and let us know what we can do to make it better and more enjoyable.  Thanks.**This app is for entertainment purposes only and is not affiliated with the show in any way.

reviews.title: The Seinfeld Challenge
reviews.comment: I\'ve already seen two questions that are marked with the wrong answer. Game makers need to do a little fact checking. High score screen is funky, doesn\'t keep track of scores correctly. All in all, if you just want some light hearted Seinfeld trivia, this app is a great time killer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To repetive
reviews.comment: Should be a lot more questions. A lot... Also the whole \"buy more questions\" is sad.   Not for a TRUE fan. Boring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good questions
reviews.comment: I like the questions, being a moderate Seinfeld fan. Would like it if vibrate off setting would actually disable vibrate, other than that great little app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun apply overall. Repeats questions.
reviews.comment: Overall is good, shortcut on desktop and icon in menu drawer both open app page in market though. Not terrible if you have service but if not it seems you wont be able to play... Repeats questions frequently. Just installed both expansions so hopefully that will lessen repeats.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix issues
reviews.comment: Leaderboard not sorted properly, sound clips repeat thrice, numerous spelling/grammar mistakes, incorrect answers, font/background colors are same making it hard to read...other than that great trivia app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: Not enough questions.   I played four rounds.  Same questions keep coming up.   Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Pam Mizell

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Turned off vibration. Still vibrates. Don\'t like timed trivia
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many repeat questions!
reviews.comment: Not paying $3 to upgrade either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love the game and the sound effects.  Gotta love the Sein!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tre- rate apps
reviews.comment: Not bad the question could be better to easy for real seinfield fans
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best show ever. Best app 2011
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the sound bites and set all kinds of them to be various ring tones buteach time I turn off my phone I loose them all and have to reset.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Same questions over and over. After 15 questions, have to purchase upgrade. Not recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Will give 5 stars when there is a global/personal leaderboard, score saving & when questions dont repeat themselves so often
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Short, sweet fun for 2 minutes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing this. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: We just issued v1.1 which fixes the freeze problem people were having. Please email us if anyone still encounters problems like this...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Freezes up on fascinate ad well. Love Seinfeld trivia and this would be an awesome game if it worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems like an amazing game. But constantly freezes on my evo. Please help!

reviews.comment: Freezes up on my EVO
